wikipedia_page.main: Ronald Arthur Baird (1908–1989) was an English professional footballer. Born in Gillingham, he joined hometown club Gillingham in 1929 from the Royal Navy Depot at nearby Chatham. He made his debut in The Football League in March 1930 against Coventry City, but it turned out to be his only appearance for the club, however, and he left to join Redhill of the Athenian League.
